title: OMXPII

content: Hi, I need to edit lolminer for Nexa, I'm using AMD 7900xtx, I don't know how to edit fans speed and gpu clock.any help please.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: DragonBall Miner A21DragonBall Miner A21 is an ASIC miner designed for NexaPow algorithm, specifically targeting NEXA (Nexa) . It delivers a maximum hashrate of 3.4Gh/s while consuming 1800W of power, resulting in an energy efficiency of 0.529j/Mh.https://www.asicminervalue.com/miners/dragonball-miner/a21Is it time to buy a Nexa?
